user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, practical, and stylish clothing options for my children that would support their active lifestyles.
purchase_reason: I needed a comfortable and practical option for my child that would allow for ease of movement during daily activities. The adjustable elastic waist was a key feature that appealed to me, ensuring a good fit without compromising on comfort.

I was looking for a hassle-free clothing option for my son that he would enjoy wearing. The pull-on design and the presence of pockets were important features that made this choice appealing, as they aligned with my need for convenience and style.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer a combination of comfort, durability, and a good fit. I value items that are well-constructed, with features that enhance usability, such as reinforced seams and moisture-wicking materials. I appreciate classic designs that are versatile for various occasions, as well as clothing that allows for ease of movement. Additionally, I tend to favor products that maintain their quality over time and provide a reliable fit, as indicated by my positive experiences with certain bags and clothing. On the other hand, I dislike items that are poorly sized, as I have encountered issues with products being too small or too big, which affects my overall satisfaction. I also tend to avoid products that do not offer good value for money or that compromise on quality.
